snippet.title: Mail Time Wholesome Snack Trailer
snippet.description:
AAAAAAAH  I'm so excited to have been a part of Wholesome Snack this year and to FINALLY announce the Kickstarter!!
We're still figuring things out but it'll for sure be the best way to pre-order the game and get a bunch of cool goodies (it's so exciting omg).

✿✿✿

PRE-SAVE THE KICKSTARTER: https://kickstarter.com/projects/freedomgamesgg/mail-time

✿✿✿

hello! my name is Kela ヾ(•ᴗ•๑)o
I'm a game developer making a cottagecore mail-delivery adventure game called Mail Time!
I stream the development of Mail Time as well as the occasional chatting, art and games :)

✿✿✿

COME FIND ME:
STEAM ✷ https://store.steampowered.com/app/1607240/Mail_Time/
DISCORD ✷ https://discord.gg/mailtime
TIKTOK ✷ https://www.tiktok.com/@mustard.soup
TWITTER ✷ https://twitter.com/KelaMakesGames
TWITCH ✷ https://www.twitch.tv/kelamakesgames

✿✿✿

FAQ
Feel free to ask anything in the comments :) this can just make it easier for you!

✿ What is Mail Time? ✿
Mail Time is a cottagecore adventure game about delivering mail to forest animals that I'm making!

✿ What platforms will it be on? ✿
Steam for PC/Mac: bit.ly/MailTimeSteam
Maybe Switch and other consoles :) (unconfirmed)

✿ How can I find out more about Mail Time? ✿
well, glad you asked ;)
You can ask anything in the comments and/or join the Discord (https://discord.gg/mailtime) to check out our FAQ

✿✿✿

(ɔ◔‿◔)ɔ ♥
